# addResizeObserver

Adds a resize observer to the specified target element.

## Parameters

| Param    | Type       | Description                                      |
| -------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| target   | `Element`  | the target element.                              |
| callback | `function` | the function called when the element is resized. |

## Returns

`function` - a function to disconnect the observer.

## Example

```js
import {useCallback, useEffect, useRef} from 'react';
import {addResizeObserver} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const ref = useRef(null);
	const handleResize = useCallback((r) => {
		// handle resize
	}, []);
	useEffect(() => addResizeObserver(ref.current, handleResize), [handleResize]);
	return <div ref={ref}>...</div>;
};
```
